original_text: And the devil that deceived them was cast into the lake of fire and brimstone, where the beast and the false prophet are, and shall be tormented day and night for ever and ever.
korean_text: 또 그들을 미혹하는 마귀가 불과 유황 못에 던져지니 거기는 그 짐승과 거짓 선지자도 있어 세세토록 밤낮 괴로움을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: And the devil that deceived them
was cast into the lake of fire and brimstone
where the beast and the false prophet are
and shall be tormented day and night
